title: Peculiar Materials 2
description: 115 Textures forming 28 Stylized Materials with emissive channels and simple customization options.
longDescription:
The second chapter to Peculiar Materials is here! This mysterious collection of stylized Materials is designed for those who want their game to look unique, abstract, and perhaps even a bit strange, leaving some room for imagination on where and how to utilize them. Easy to reverse-engineer or customize! Simple and clean master Material(s) and Instances along with some useful comments.


The theme of this particular Peculiar Materials-pack is fractals. When tiled, these materials turn into cool patterns. The materials also have carefully designed emissive channels that can be utilized if needed. The pack comes with an example for Parallax Occlusion but the materials work well with Tessellation too, highlighting only the largest shapes.


Video preview: https://youtu.be/WliFImenWNw


PACK CONTAINS:

  • 115 Textures (4096x4096)
  • 1 Basic Master Material + 25 Instances
  • 1 Masked Master Material + 2 Instances
  • 1 Decal Master Material + 1 Instance
  • 1 Decal
technicalDetails:
TEXTURES FOR:

  • Diffuse
  • Normal
  • Roughness
  • Metallic
  • Ambient Occlusion
  • Height
  • Emissive
  • Opacity (3x)


ADJUSTABLE PARAMETERS:

  • Emissive Activated (true/false)
  • Parallax Occlusion Activated (true/false)
  • Invert Diffuse
  • Invert Metallic
  • Invert Roughness
  • Invert Emissive
  • Emissive Intensity
  • Emissive Color
  • Diffuse Color/Hue
  • Diffuse Contrast
  • Diffuse Saturation
  • Diffuse Intensity
  • Roughness Contrast
  • Roughness Min
  • Roughness Max
  • Metallic Contrast
  • Metallic Min
  • Metallic Max
  • Ambient Occlusion Contrast
  • Ambient Occlusion Min
  • Ambient Occlusion Max
  • Height Contrast
  • Height Min
  • Height Max
  • Height BumpOffSet
  • Texture Scale
  • Specular
  • Normal Intensity


Number of Materials:

  • 3 Master Materials
  • 28 Material Instances


Number of Textures:

  • Total number of Textures 115
  • 28 Diffuse Maps
  • 28 Normal Maps
  • 28 MRAOH Maps (Metallic, Roughness, Ambient Occlusion, Height)
  • 28 Emissive Maps
  • 3 Opacity Maps


Texture Resolution: 4096x4096

Source File Format: PNG

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, Xbox One

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, PS4, Xbox One

Engine Compatibility: 4.20+

Intended Platform: PC, Mac, Console

Platforms Tested: Windows 10

Documentation Included: No
